org.apache.paimon.mergetree

Class MergeTreeWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.paimon.mergetree.MergeTreeWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MemoryOwner, RecordWriter<KeyValue>

    public class MergeTreeWriter
extends Object
implements RecordWriter<KeyValue>, MemoryOwner
    A RecordWriter to write records and generate CompactIncrement.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Add files to the internal CompactManager.
      void close()

      Compact files related to the writer.

      • sync

        public void sync()
          throws Exception
        Description copied from interface: RecordWriter
        Sync the writer. The structure related to file reading and writing is thread unsafe, there are asynchronous threads inside the writer, which should be synced before reading data.
        Specified by:
        sync in interface RecordWriter<KeyValue>
        Throws:
        Exception
